title: Space Creature set
info: The Space Creature set is a set of vanity items consisting of the Space Creature Mask, Space Creature Shirt, and Space Creature Pants. Its male and female variants look identical. It has a 5.26*1/19 (5.26%) chance to drop from Goodie Bags during Halloween.
